features: RETINOL 24 TO THE MAX: This facial moisturizer penetrates the surface of your skin at night to transform your skin with Retinol 24's maximum concentration of hydrators
FRAGRANCE-FREE CREAM: This Fragrance free, Rich and Creamy moisturizer absorbs quickly so you're not left with a greasy feeling (or pillow)
MAXIMIZED INGREDIENTS: Our Retinol 24 formula now in Max, with 20% more Retinol 24 hydrating complex vs. Base Retinol24
GET YOUR BEAUTY SLEEP: Massage cream over your face and neck at night. Always use SPF in the daytime when using Retinol
24 HOUR TRANSFORMATION: Visibly smooths and brightens thanks to the Retinol 24 hydrating complex
WHEN LESS IS MORE: Made without fragrance, phthalates, mineral oil, or synthetic dyes
body.description: Max out your Retinol 24, This Olay Regenerist Retinol 24 Max moisturizer penetrates the surface of your skin at night to deliver skin transformation. We've packed this fragrance-free formula with retinol 24's maximum concentration of hydrators to leave you feeling hydrated and replenished. Our Retinol 24 formula is now in Max form With 20% more Retinol 24 Hydrating Complex, this formula visibly smooths wrinkles and evens tone. After cleansing, massage over your face and neck at night and wake to radiant skin. This formula contains no fragrance, phthalates, mineral oil, or synthetic dyes. Are you ready to maximize your skin care routine? Also included is a 1 week sample of our Regenerist Whip Facial Moisturizer. This fragrance-free whipped moisturizer absorbs instantly leaving your skin feeling soft and smooth, never greasy. Vs. Base Retinol24

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Olay Regenerist Retinol Moisturizer, Retinol 24 Night Face Cream Olay Regenerist Retinol 24 Facial Moisturizer penetrates deep into skin’s surface layers. Our proprietary blend of Vitamin B3 + Retinol complex hydrates skin for 24 hours for a bounty of benefits. You’ll see visible improvements in fine lines & wrinkles, smoothness, brightness, firming, dark spots, and pores. Retinol 24 delivers all of these benefits with virtually no irritation. This fragrance and dye free moisturizer absorbs quickly and goes deep into your skin’s surface layers so you wake up every morning to younger-looking, radiant skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Olay Regenerist Collagen Peptide 24 MAX Hydrating Face Moisturizer is an exceptional product for maintaining hydrated and youthful-looking skin. With its powerful blend of collagen peptides, it nourishes and rejuvenates the skin, leaving it feeling plump, smooth, and refreshed. The lightweight yet intensely moisturizing formula absorbs quickly into the skin, providing long-lasting hydration without any greasy residue. Olay Regenerist's commitment to skincare excellence shines through in this product, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their skincare routine with a superior hydrating face moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is lightweight non-greasy and absorbs nicely and you don’t need much. No scent too which is a big plus! Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works immediately.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am a high end girlie. I don’t use drugstore products at all generally. Someone recommend it to me and I have been super unhappy with my skin lately, dark bags, fine lines etc. Within 2 minutes I swear to you. I saw a difference! My under eye was visibly smoother and my skin looked much more hydrated. Also no sticky residue at all! I will repost in a week or so of using nightly. So far, I am amazed— and annoyed at the money I wasted on 100 dollar retinoids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product but not for everyday used
reviews.reviewText: I like these product just is not to be used everyday it burn my face after using 3 times in a week still very soft and creamy I think is ideal just to used once a week

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I tried two other kinds of Olay I like them the whip which is great! But I also try like an orange color one or something but this purple one is the one that's the best so I suggest when browsing look for this purple one it works like it says my brown spots have faded and I'm looking good so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this cream
reviews.reviewText: Just started using this about a week ago and I love it already. Not greasy at all. 5 stars. Will definitely reorder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The product seems to work for wrinkles and overall skin smoothness
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Olay products for awhile and love them.The only negative is that I did not receive the small Whip Creme that was suppose to be with the order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles on face improved
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Recommend. Little more expensive than what I want to spend otherwise it worked.
